system.description:
During a camp scene, you can share a bottle or two with your allies. Choose one of the following:

Type

Effect

Check

Fruity Wine

@EFFECT[ins-up]

@CHECK[mig wlp easy]

Regional Beer

@EFFECT[wlp-up]

@CHECK[mig wlp normal]

Spirits

@EFFECT[dex-up]

@CHECK[mig wlp hard]

Each character that takes a drink must make an Alcohol Tolerance Check to tolerate its effects. Any character that fails is compelled to try again. If they fail the check 3 times they will suffer from @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.Rrx394UCBCyTljSj]{Hangover} at the end of the camp scene.

Any effects gained last until the end of the next conflict scene.
